attributes.additional_details:
Also, weekends are meant to be a rest and a break from school/work but teachers still give homework to do at the weekend and expect the students to finish it. 
So please sign this petition...
attributes.background: Education is better now and students don't need to have 5 days of learning each week. Furthermore, students need more time to do their homework on a weekend. Some people do not have time to do any homework on Saturday and Sunday because they have other important things to do.
